Hi! Iâ€™m Tasneem, a final-year Computer Science student with a growing interest in native Android development. I have a strong passion for learning how to build mobile applications and enjoy working with tools like Kotlin and Android Studio.
As someone just starting out in Android development, I am dedicated to building a solid foundation by understanding the core concepts and practicing through small, hands-on projects. My goal is to steadily grow my skills and become a capable Android developer, contributing to meaningful projects that make a real impact in the future.
